name: PeerMe MultiSig: Discard Action
title: Discard a proposal
description: Use when a user wants to discard and remove a multi-sig proposal. All signatures must be removed first before a proposal can be discarded.

inputs.name: Action ID
inputs.description: The ID of the proposal to discard. All signatures must be removed first.
inputs.bot: If the user hasn't specified an action ID, first run 'Get Pending Actions' to show what's available.
